description: This is a Flutter widget class defining the home screen of a note-taking app, including UI elements for displaying, searching, refreshing, creating, viewing, and deleting notes. It interacts with provider-based state management, navigation, and standard Flutter widgets.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main screen of the notes application, managing navigation, search, refresh, and display of notes.

methods.name: _openCreate
methods.description: Asynchronous method to open the note editor screen for creating a new note, then refreshes the notes list after the editor is closed.

methods.name: _openView
methods.description: Asynchronous method to open the view screen for a specific note, then refreshes the notes list after closing the view.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the home screen, including app bar, search field, note list, and actions.
